title: Escape from the sea
creator_credit: Wallace Productions, A. Frank Bundy and Peter Seabourne
brief_description: A film designed for a youthful audience depicting the adventures of a boy about 12 years old who gets into difficulty in the sea in his rubber dingy. He is rescued by a scouting group who then have problems when their leader is hit by falling rocks. He in turn is rescued by helicopter. Filmed on the foreshores of Cornwall this is a “safety” film showing the work of the Royal Naval Rescue Service and HM Coastguard.
